Articles.Content:
I'm in Sandbox.

I'm waiting for career to have a little more meat on it's bones first.

I also the older versions of said mods so I can't think that an older file is messing with it.

Edited December 19, 2013 by Lostami

Changelog v32b (Dec 19):

  • Docking Cam: Working again
  • Lazor System: Space center menu should display more appropriately.
Confirmed working again, thank you very much for your hard work!

Changelog v32b (Dec 19):

  • Docking Cam: Working again
  • Lazor System: Space center menu should display more appropriately.

Thanks Romfarer!

I can't seem to get this in my career mode tree but it's appearing fine in sandbox, anybody who has it working could give me their config?

Scratch that; http://puu.sh/4SxDr.png it's way at the end and I haven't gotten there yet.

Edited December 20, 2013 by Sekonda
great! thank you for the update.

Parts from the guided weapons and the Lazor system still won't show up in my game parts menu in sandbox.

Also I don't see the lazor guided bomb in the parts files at all.

Infact the lazor guided weapons pack has not been updated since Oct 17.

Edited December 20, 2013 by Lostami

Does the "robotics arm pack" still work with this? i can't seem to find the GUI, doesn't show. Is there something i have to do to activate it? Thx.

EDIT: fixed it, conflicted with another mod

Edited December 22, 2013 by TNM

Changelog v32b (Dec 19):

  • Docking Cam: Working again
  • Lazor System: Space center menu should display more appropriately.

Awesome, thanks, docking cam is purring like a kitten

but how do you add the blinding light effect that the bomb had in v.18? That is what i miss. We want our bombs to go visibly nuclear! Modifying the rate of thrust and range of blastRadius and destructionRadius is only secondary.

Edited December 22, 2013 by I was David Bowman
I'd just like the mod to work at this point.. I have been banging my head trying to get this thing to work but the parts just don't show in my game.
Can someone help me get a MM config to add this to the capsules with all the lazers? If you could much appreciated.

As there have been minimal responses, here are some screen shots to refere to.

http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/battleshipcraft/images/0/0a/Screen_Shot_2013-12-04_at_3.24.50_PM.png

http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/battleshipcraft/images/f/fb/Screen_Shot_2013-12-04_at_3.25.13_PM.png

this also is the case with me on .23 on OSX 10.8

Can anybody tell me at which point in the tech tree the missiles and the sunbeam laser unlock?

I'm asking for a... friend.

No, but seriously, I want to use them for debris cleaning.

this also is the case with me on .23 on OSX 10.8

I don't own a mac so i can't verify wether this is an actual bug or just the cause of an incorrect installation.

This issue occurs when the plugin can't find the textures that comes with it. Either because you have more than one Romfarer.dll installed or the textures are missing.

Can anybody tell me at which point in the tech tree the missiles and the sunbeam laser unlock?

I'm asking for a... friend.

No, but seriously, I want to use them for debris cleaning.

The missiles are unlocked with experimental rocketry.
Thank you!

Ok, from looking through my log, I think some of the textures are not loading, which is why I am not getting certain GUIs.

http://pastebin.com/Rz2dHDau

Could you take a look real quick?

I don't own a mac so i can't verify wether this is an actual bug or just the cause of an incorrect installation.

This issue occurs when the plugin can't find the textures that comes with it. Either because you have more than one Romfarer.dll installed or the textures are missing.

This happens to me as well. The part of the interface which is essentially the windows boarders (in particular, at the top) with the controls that that let you close a window (the "x" button in the upper right) are invisible. I can guess and click to the right of the window title and finally hit something that either centers the window on the screen or closes the window altogether (the latter behavior is the desired behavior). I am running a Mac with osx 10.7.5 and KSP 0.23. This add-on to ksp is excellent so am hoping it can be "repaired" to work properly for us Mac folks. Thanks Romfarer!!!

Ok, from looking through my log, I think some of the textures are not loading, which is why I am not getting certain GUIs.

http://pastebin.com/Rz2dHDau

Could you take a look real quick?

The log looks like it is loading the textures successfully. Perhaps it's conflicting with TextureCompressor or some other mod?

I've noticed that whenever the Lazor System is activated, all electrical charge is replenished. Is there a way to disable this? I would prefer it to be more realistic, i think this feature makes things to easy.

I've noticed that whenever the Lazor System is activated, all electrical charge is replenished. Is there a way to disable this? I would prefer it to be more realistic, i think this feature makes things to easy.

Lazor system should only replenish energy reserves when you have enabled that option in the space center lazor ui.

Note: Lazor System requires KSP version 0.22. It will NOT work properly on earlier versions.

That is the first line of the overview for the download link on the first page. I do have the correct version but this confused the hell out of me.

My question is can I use this in the campaign? I dont see any unlockable parts, however I did see all the parts in the sandbox mode. If you cant use it in the campaign can you put that in the overview? Thanks.
In the staging, my missiles and my lazor system are blank boxes. Is there a way to fix this?
Is there a way to get just kerbal IVAs, without all the laser bits and flight systems?
